short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark theme for D2L platform called UMlearn, for University of Manitoba

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark theme for D2L platform called UMlearn, for University of Manitoba. Made by Maxim Abdulkhalikov and Denys Popov. App uses local storage to save a state of D2L website and remember if you made your website dark for future uses.
